definition: for fear that/lest/also written 惟恐
-ism/only/alone
yes
afraid/frightened/to fear
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

sentences.english: Jupiter, to stop questions, replied that it was a fresh creation from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 朱庇特唯恐她再追問下去就答說這是大地的新造物。

sentences.english: He's frightened to stay out late in case his mother lays into him again.
sentences.chinese: 他很怕在外邊呆得太晚，唯恐母親又要把他痛打一頓。

sentences.english: When we passed His window, we stepped softly, for fear of disturBing.
sentences.chinese: 我們從他窗前經過時，放輕了腳步，唯恐打擾他。

sentences.english: To this point he has been discreet in dreading to provoke me;
sentences.chinese: 關於這一點，他一直很謹慎，唯恐把我惹急了。

sentences.english: Morel subdued, afraid to seem too jubilant in presence of his wife.
sentences.chinese: 毛萊爾默不作聲，唯恐在妻子面前過於喜形於色。

sentences.english: Bolo afraid of people not knowing his title.
sentences.chinese: 博洛唯恐別人不知道他的頭銜。

sentences.english: I trembled lest he should send me to call her;
sentences.chinese: 我直髮抖，唯恐他差我去叫她。

sentences.english: Be stage series measure in succession by percussive country wary avoid not as good as.
sentences.chinese: 受到衝擊的國家紛紛出臺系列措施唯恐避之不及。

sentences.english: He ran away lest he should be seen.
sentences.chinese: 他逃跑了，唯恐被別人看見。

sentences.english: They are afraid to be late with hurry up.
sentences.chinese: 他們急急忙忙地趕路，唯恐遲到。

sentences.english: It’s in your best interest to get married and start a family, lest you end up dying alone.
sentences.chinese: 結婚成家，唯恐一個人孤獨地死去。

sentences.english: For fear that he should lose it.
The farmer takes care not to damage a single bean.
sentences.chinese: 這位農夫動作小心，唯恐傷及任何一枚籽實。

sentences.english: Its wings are weak in flight. Afraid to be unknown, All night it gleams alone.
sentences.chinese: 螢火輕飛翔，翅膀翕動忙，唯恐人不知，整夜閃微光。

sentences.english: He protected the baby with one arm for fear of its getting hurt.
sentences.chinese: 膊保護着嬰兒，唯恐嬰兒受到傷害。

sentences.english: Walking into the break room is a moment of terror that fills all coffee fiends with dread.
sentences.chinese: 走進休息室，咖啡癮君子們唯恐壺中空無一物。

definition: for fear that/lest/also written 唯恐
to fear/afraid/extremely nervous/for fear that/to avoid/so as not to
trembling with fear/with fear and trepidation
so as not to/so as to avoid
anxious/panicky
to be on tenterhooks (idiom)/to be anxious and frightened
to slight/to neglect
to tremble with fear (idiom)/scared witless
cautious and timid (idiom); prudent/careful
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
to alarm/to agitate
lit. heart alarmed, trembling in fear (idiom); prostrate with fear/scared witless
panic-stricken
in fear and trepidation (idiom); in reverence before your majesty (court formula of humility)
to cower/to flinch/to quail/to recoil
to keep quiet out of fear (idiom)
